trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Plymouth
There were no other sightings in Plymouth on or around September 27th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was traveling home from work at around 5:00am in the morning and was going down 5mile west of Plymouth and suddenly came upon these bright orange circular lights two of them in which had a triangle shape to them side by side hovering and slightly heading NW on 5mile and finally descended past some trees in which I could no longer see them. Their lights were flashing in a flashing pattern and I have never ever seen anything like this before. I was so intrigued by the view it had my adrenaline going. I was on my way home at the time and this is a lot of country life area in which I had seen them. It was around 5:30 in the actual time I had viewed this amazing sight.
Summary: bright orange light flashing in a circular fashion hovering in which there were two of them and then moved beyond the trees in which i could no longer view them
